name: Pylons
description:
Pylons is a fast-paced top-down arcade shooter where you need you survive as long as you can! Overload volatile energy nodes before they self-destruct, but watch out for self-defusing modules; overloading their defuse protocol will have explosive results!

We've built an exciting experience that's quick to pick up to kill a few minutes but addictive enough for endless entertainment. How competitive are you? Instant replayability is perfect for hot seat multiplayer!

Pylons is still in active development because there's a lot of awesome stuff we want to add to the game over time. The current game is fully functional and playable, and all future updates will be free.

Have any questions? Feel free to reach out, we're friendly!
